alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 23 at 8:56PM MDT until June 24 at 8:54AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Fowler affecting Crowley and Otero Counties. .Recent heavy rainfall combined with high flows from snow melt will cause portions of the Arkansas River to remain at or above flood stage. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale, Nepesta, Fowler, La Junta...Minor to Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Arkansas River Near Fowler. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, Minor Flood. Minor agricultural flooding occurs northeast of Rocky Ford and elsewhere. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM MDT Friday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM MDT Friday was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 12.5 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 13.5 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 900 AM MDT.
